about_the_game:
--- Your screams will not reach to anyone in this forbidden land.
Forbidden is a top-down horror game and your goal is escape from this cursed lands.
Collect items and running away from monsters.

◆ Procedural Item generation
You have to collect items before you escape.
Items will be appear at random locations each times you play.

◆ Cooperation multiplayer ( 4 player co-op)
You can not survive without help.
You have to cooporate with other 3 players.

Main features:

●Simple controll
You can excute all action with mouse click.

●Run and hide
If the enemy is nearby, you can hide in the grass or on under the desk and you will have a chance to avoid them.

● No save point
There are no checkpoints or saves in the game, so if you die you will back at the beginning.
